description: One of the main protagonists of the series`, Roy lives with only one aim - to find his daughter, which had been lost after a catastrophy also known as Blast Fall (which also took his wife`s life). Roy usually tries to appear gruff and standoffish, however, he presents more parental features in Solty`s presence. He works as a bounty hunter at "Maverick Hunters" agency, and simultaneously has the duty of being Miranda Maverick`s (who happens to be the head of the agency) bodyguard.
name: Roy Revant
